public void act()
Act - do whatever the Dennis wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.

breakIce

public void breakIce()
Adds pieces of broken ice to the world, these pieces are affected by gravity just as the character is after he jumps. Should be called after broken out of a freeze attack

checkFreeze

public void checkFreeze()
If hit by a freeze attack, character is frozen for a short period of time.

checkHit

public void checkHit()
Checks if character is hit. Character is considered hit if he is not in a grace or defence state and if the other character is in a hostile state and touching.

checkHitCount

public void checkHitCount()
If hit n or more times, character falls down otherwise he is just hurt.

checkKnockback

public void checkKnockback()
Checks if an knockback ability is used, if so moves the character back/forward two pixel.

reset

public void reset()
Multi-Purpose Method: Resets character back to breathing animation if no actions are issued. Resets the grace period. Resets the hit count after a period of time.
